metadata.title: CVE-2023-31973 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** yasm v1.3.0 was discovered to contain a use after free viathe function expand_mmac_params at /nasm/nasm-pp.c. Note: Multiple thirdparties dispute this as a bug and not a vulnerability according to the YASMsecurity policy.

criterions.comment: yasm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
